reporting-org.narrative: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)

title.narrative: Human Rights & Governance NGO Secretariat Program

description.narrative: The Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC) remains committed to promoting the respect for human rights and advocating for the applicability of the International Humanitarian law (IHL) in its efforts to promote the rule of law and accountability in the oPt. - Based on the positive results of the external review of the Secretariat of NGO Development Center (NDC) conducted in May 2009, the four donors (Switzerland, Sweden, Denmark and Netherlands) opted to renew their harmonized aid to the Human Rights (HR) and Good Governance (GG) sectors. The four donors of the HR/GG secretariat are willing to embark on a new phase of 38 months (phase 3). The overall goal of their contribution is to improve the HR and GG situation in the oPt through a harmonized funding mechanism that encourages joint actions among partners and results oriented work plans. SDC will remain the lead donor during this new phase.
